00037     struct GLUniformReference
00038     {
00040         GLint  mLocation;
00042         GpuProgramType mSourceProgType;
00044         const GpuConstantDefinition* mConstantDef;
00045     };
00046 
00047     typedef vector<GLUniformReference>::type GLUniformReferenceList;
00048     typedef GLUniformReferenceList::iterator GLUniformReferenceIterator;
00049

00089         {

00093                 :name(_name), attrib(_attrib) {}
